chart.name: validated.invoices.per.customer
chart.title: Unpaid Invoices Per Customer
chart.dataset:
select
gst_party.name,
count(party) as invoicecount
from gst_invoice
join gst_party on gst_party .id = gst_invoice .party
where
status = 'validated'
group by gst_party.name

chart.name: invoice.per.status
chart.title: Invoices / Status
chart.dataset:
select
gst_invoice.status as sta, sum(gst_invoice.gross_amount) as amount
from gst_invoice group by status

chart.name: category.per.product
chart.title: Invoices Per Category per Product
chart.dataset:
select
count(gp.category) as count_category, gpc.name as category_name
from gst_product gp left join gst_product_category gpc on gpc.id = gp.category
group by gpc.name

chart.name: customer.per.state
chart.title: Customer / State
chart.dataset: SELECT state.name as state_name, count(distinct party_addr.id) as party_per_state FROM gst_state state LEFT JOIN gst_address address on address.state = state.id LEFT JOIN( SELECT party.id, pa.address as addr FROM gst_party party LEFT JOIN gst_party_address pa on party.id = pa.gst_party WHERE party.customer = true ) party_addr on address.id = party_addr.addr GROUP BY state.name
